name: Nexus Network - Forums Dark to Light Conversion
description: Converts the Nexus Mods forum's dark theme into the light theme. The dark theme has many more features in a much better layout, and the white theme is missing many icons and resources. This just makes things fair and look better.
additional_info:
• There are still many areas that have not been converted yet. As I find new pages I convert them when I have time.
  • Sometimes things don't get themed correctly. I really don't know why except that this is nearly 1000 lines of CSS that are getting applied after the fact and well, that's a lot.
Update Notes: 11/19/14
  • Fixed the read icon showing as the "read and replied" icon
